text: Maria Full of Grace (Spanish title: María, llena eres de gracia, lit., "Maria, you are full of grace") is a 2004 Colombian Ecuadorian American drama movie directed by Joshua Marston and starring Catalina Sandino Moreno, Yenny Paola Vega, Guilied López, John Alex Toro, Patricia Rae, Virginia Ariza. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 2005. == Other websites == * * * * * * Category:2004 drama movies Category:Colombian movies Category:Ecuadorian movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Joshua Marston Category:Movies about drugs Category:Movies set in Colombia Category:Movies set in Ecuador Category:Movies set in New York City
title: Maria Full of Grace
